titleStmt.title: XVI sermons preached in the University of Oxford, and at court. / By Rich. Gardiner, D.D. Chaplain in ordinary to King Charles deceased. Together with his sermons preached in Bow-Church London, on the anniversary meeting of Hereford-shire natives, June 24. 1658.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Richard, 1591-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Cottiel, for Joseph Barber at the Lamb, and Samuel Speed at the printing-Press in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: With a seperate dated title page (p.[283]): A sermon preached in Bow-Church London, on the anniversary meeting of Herefordshire natives, June 24. 1658. By Rich. Gardiner. D.D. London: printed for Sam. Speed, at the Printing-Press in St. Paul's Church-yard, 1659.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb:"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the printing-Press in St. Paul's Church-yard.
